verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
C
We worship Thee, dear Lord,
in the beauty of holiness
Clothed in holy array.

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
We worship Thee, dear Lord,
in the beauty of holiness
With an off'ring of praise.

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
We only come to You
in the raiment You gave us
When on the cross
You purchased and saved us

verse.name: v1d
verse.lines:
Removed our rags,
cleansed and robed us in white
Living in You we
share the beauty of holiness.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
We worship Thee, dear Lord,
in the beauty of holiness
Set apart unto Thee.

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
We worship Thee, dear Lord,
in the beauty of holiness
Called to be holy priests.

verse.name: v2c
verse.lines:
We bow before your
throne and worship Your holiness
Yielding to Your rulership over us

verse.name: v2d
verse.lines:
Called and ordered by
Your authority.
Living in You we share
the beauty of holiness.
